revision.text: Possibly: Probably: Monsieur Bossu's treatise of the epick poem..., by René Le Bossu. 2v. (London : Printed for J. Knapton, at the Crown, and H. Clements, at the Half-Moon, in St. Paul's Church-Yard, 1719). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2452845~S1
